node.excerpt: Introduction Spring Boot is Spring's convention-over-configuration solution for creating stand-alone, production-grade Spring-based Applications that you can "just run". Some of Spring Boot feature are: Create stand-alone Spring applications Embed Tomcat or Jetty directly (no need to deploy WARâ€¦
